titleStmt.title: Poems, with a maske by Thomas Carew ... ; the songs were set in musick by Mr. Henry Lawes ...
titleStmt.author: Carew, Thomas, 1595?-1639?
Lawes, Henry, 1596-1662. Coelum britannicum. Libretto.
Carew, Thomas, 1595?-1639? Coelum britannicum.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition revised and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.M., and are to be sold by J. Martin ...,

notesStmt.note: "The three supplementary poems at the end of the volume constitute the only new matter in this edition, which is not as correctly printed as the previous ones." Cf. Grolier. Wither to Prior.
Added t.p. on p. [171]: Coelum britannicum : a masque in Whitehall at the Banqueting House ... / Tho. Carew and Inigo Jones. London : Printed for Hum. Moseley, 1651.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
